attributes.action: ensure that an MP can be recalled from Parliament if 1% of that constituency's electorate sign a document
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent spate of disagreements over the conduct of MP's with regard to their expense claims, the best way forward would be if 1% of an MP's electorate were to write to either the Electoral Commission or the returning officer for that constituency, then an MP should be forced to stand down and fight a by-election.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
